summary: This document is a chain of emails from June 2019 between FBI personnel in New York and the Victim Services Division, coordinating a conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case. The call was scheduled for June 28, 2019, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.

persons.name: FBI Special Agent
persons.context: Appears as a sender/recipient in the email chain from the FBI New York office, coordinating the victim interview call.

persons.name: Child/Adolescent Forensic Interviewer
persons.role: Child/Adolescent Forensic Interviewer, FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: Identified as a participant from the FBI's Victim Services Division, Child Victim Services Unit, involved in scheduling the call regarding Epstein victim interviews.

connections.description: Both are FBI personnel coordinating a conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein victim interviews coordination call
events.description: A scheduled unclassified conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case, involving FBI personnel from New York and the Victim Services Division.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively coordinating victim interviews in the Epstein case as of June 2019.
A conference call was scheduled for June 28, 2019, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time to discuss these interviews.
Participants included FBI personnel from the New York office and the Victim Services Division's Child Victim Services Unit.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination, with multiple redacted names typical of law enforcement communications.
